text:
A Summons Awaits

<Raskolnikov's small, cluttered room; tense atmosphere>  
<He feels trapped and anxious.>  
Nastasya: “Open, you stupid! Wake up!”  

Raskolnikov: “What do they want? All’s discovered.”  
Porter: “A summons to the police office.”  

Raskolnikov: “To the police? What for?”  
Nastasya: “You’re ill! Don’t go.”  

---
<Raskolnikov holding torn rags; confusion and dread>  
<He clutches the paper tightly.>  
Nastasya: “You’ve been in a fever!”  

Raskolnikov: “What have I got here?”  
Nastasya: “Just stay put. There’s no hurry.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov receives a summons to the police office while grappling with illness and anxiety over his situation.
